title: Bye Bye Bye
brief_description: In the year 2000, *Nsync waved bye, bye, bye to their second place status in the boy band race with the Backstreet Boys with this certified hit that’s music video memorably featured the troupe dancing on puppet strings.

constellations_other.name: Like a puppet on a string
constellations_other.description: From the silly to the sinister, puppets, muppets, dummies and toys on-screen.
